title: Senate Passes Bipartisan Infrastructure Bill
content: Senate Passes Bipartisan Infrastructure Bill In a rare display of bipartisan cooperation, the U.S. Senate passed a $1.2 trillion infrastructure bill aimed at modernizing roads, bridges, broadband, and energy systems across the country.

title: Supreme Court Hears Key Immigration Case
content: Supreme Court Hears Key Immigration Case The U.S. Supreme Court on Tuesday began hearing arguments in a case that could have significant implications for immigration policy. The case, brought by civil rights organizations, challenges the administration’s stance on asylum seekers.

title: Puerto Rico Seeks Jones Act Waiver After Hurricane
content: Puerto Rico Seeks Jones Act Waiver After Hurricane Following the devastation of Hurricane Maria, Puerto Rico's governor has requested a waiver from the Jones Act to speed up aid. Lawmakers from both parties expressed support for emergency relief measures.
